titles.title: A bill extending the existing suspensions of duty on certain chemicals until January 1, 1991.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/16/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1990, the existing suspension of duty on sulfathiazole, acetylsulfaguanidine, sulfamethazine, sulfaguanidine, sulfaquinoxaline and sulfanilamide, and iron-dextron complex.
